text: Wohi Allah Taalaa hai jiss ney tujh per kitab utari jiss mein wazeh mazboot aayaten hain jo asal kitab hain aur baaz mutashabeh aayaten hain. Pus jin kay dilon mein kuji hai woh to iss ki mutashabeh aayaton kay peechay lag jatay hain fitney ki talab aur inn kay murad ki justujoo kay liye halankay inn ki haqeeqi murad ko siwaye Allah Taalaa kay koi nahi janta aur pukhta aur mazboor ilm walay yehi kehtay hain kay hum to inn per eman laa chukay yeh humaray rab ki taraf say hain aur naseehat to sirf aqal mand hi hasil kertay hain
